title: Royal Bikana Caterers premium Rajputana-themed multi-page catering website (Bikaner)

requirements.text: Implement a multi-page marketing website for the catering business with the following pages and navigation: Home, About Us, Services, Menu, Gallery, Contact. Include a responsive header with the business name "ROYAL BIKANA CATERERS", tagline "Shahi Swad • Royal Andaaz", and clear navigation links that work on mobile (hamburger menu) and desktop.

quotes:
Website Pages & Content:

1) HOME PAGE ...

2) ABOUT US PAGE ...

3) SERVICES PAGE ...

4) MENU PAGE ...

5) GALLERY PAGE ...

6) CONTACT PAGE ...

acceptanceCriteria: All 6 pages are reachable via in-app navigation without full page reload.
Navigation collapses into a mobile menu on small screens.
Business name and tagline are visible in the header (or within the hero on Home) on initial load.

requirements.text: Apply the requested premium Royal Rajputana visual design consistently across all pages: maroon/wine red base, gold accents, subtle traditional Indian pattern textures, and royal elements (crown/shield motifs). The layout must remain clean and modern while retaining a traditional Indian touch, and must be mobile-first and performant.

quotes:
Theme & Design:
- Royal Rajputana style
- Colors: Maroon / Wine Red background with Golden accents
- Elegant traditional Indian design
- Premium, wedding-focused look
- Use royal elements like crown, shield, subtle Indian patterns
- Clean, modern layout but with traditional Indian touch
- Mobile-friendly and fast loading

acceptanceCriteria: All pages share a consistent color palette (maroon/wine + gold) and typography styling.
Royal motifs/patterns are present but subtle (do not reduce text readability).
All key sections are usable on mobile widths (320px+) with no horizontal scroll.
Page renders quickly with optimized assets (no uncompressed huge images).

requirements.text: Build the Home page with: (a) hero section using a royal background, (b) heading "Royal Wedding & Event Catering in Bikaner", (c) subheading "Authentic Marwari & Shahi Cuisine for Weddings, Parties & Events", and (d) two CTA buttons labeled "Book Catering" and "Get Menu" that navigate users to Contact and Menu pages respectively. Add a highlight section listing: Live Catering Available, Pure & Hygienic Food, Royal Marwari Special, Wedding • Party • Events • Corporate Catering.

requirements.text: Build the About Us page and render the provided About content exactly (verbatim) in professional English formatting suitable for a premium wedding-catering brand.

quotes:

Content:

requirements.text: Implement SEO-friendly structure and basic on-page SEO for all pages: meaningful page titles, meta descriptions, semantic headings, and performance-friendly assets. Include the provided keywords naturally in relevant page copy and/or meta descriptions without keyword stuffing: "Best Caterers in Bikaner", "Wedding Caterers in Bikaner", "Marwari Catering Service", "Royal Catering Bikaner".

quotes:

- Keywords:

  "Wedding Caterers in Bikaner"

- Fast loading

acceptanceCriteria: Each page has a unique, relevant document title and meta description.
At least one page (Home and/or Services) includes the target keywords in visible copy in a natural way.
Pages use semantic structure (single H1 per page; appropriate H2/H3).
Lighthouse-style best practices are followed (compressed images, no blocking large assets).

constraints: User-facing text must be in English (simple, professional Indian English).
Do not modify files under frontend/src/components/ui or any other immutable paths listed in SYSTEM_CONTEXT; compose existing UI components instead of editing them.
Backend must remain a single Motoko actor (no additional backend services, no external databases).
No third-party email/SMS/push notification integrations; contact capture must be handled within the app and/or via WhatsApp links.
nonGoals: Online payments, booking deposits, or invoicing.
Third-party authentication providers (only Internet Identity if authentication is ever needed later).
CMS/admin dashboard for managing gallery/menu content (static content is sufficient for this build).
